channel.title: NegativeTwo - A failed project
channel.description:
Well basically it was a learning experience...surprisingly I learned a lot just today editing this client lol...Was supposed to be NegativeOne but it failed so it can be 'NegativeTwo' lolol...So no one steal my name of NegativeOne plz...I quit this client, there'll be no updates to THIS one... Download: [code] http://www.ziddu.com/download/4888935/NegativeTwo.zip.html [/code]
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/34pmk3d.png[/img] BY VIEWING THIS THREAD YOU'RE AGREEING THAT YOU WILL NOT STEAL MY IDEA FOR THE CHAT BUTTONS...KAY
It's renamed, sprites load via cache...Nothing really special about it at all...just thought I'd upload something lol PS: it's meant to have 8 line chat, but I didnt' feel like doing that...cause I realized how much my ideas failed
PS TWO: if you want to change the link for the website button, it's the first string in the client class.
OH yeah, for the bank button to work add this action button [code] case 48508: openUpBank(); break; [/code]

item.title: NegativeTwo - A failed project
item.dc:creator: @Zack77 Zack77
item.description:
@Zack77 wrote:

Well basically it was a learning experience…surprisingly I learned a lot just today editing this client lol…Was supposed to be NegativeOne but it failed so it can be ‘NegativeTwo’ lolol…So no one steal my name of NegativeOne plz…I quit this client, there’ll be no updates to THIS one…
Download:

http://www.ziddu.com/download/4888935/NegativeTwo.zip.html


BY VIEWING THIS THREAD YOU’RE AGREEING THAT YOU WILL NOT STEAL MY IDEA FOR THE CHAT BUTTONS…KAY

It’s renamed, sprites load via cache…Nothing really special about it at all…just thought I’d upload something lol
PS: it’s meant to have 8 line chat, but I didnt’ feel like doing that…cause I realized how much my ideas failed

PS TWO: if you want to change the link for the website button, it’s the first string in the client class.

OH yeah, for the bank button to work add this action button

case 48508:
openUpBank();
break;
